publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2350 Sandra White: Medical Aid to Palestineâ€”That the Parliament commends and supports the efforts of Linda Willis and Khalil Al Niss to deliver personally much needed medical supplies and equipment into the Gaza Strip on behalf of the people of Scotland by driving from Edinburgh to Palestine; notes that since arriving in Egypt, the Egyptian authorities have demanded a letter from the Scottish Parliament to prove that the medicines have been donated by the Scottish people, and hopes that the authorities will allow Linda and Khalil safe passage without further delay. Supported by: Dr Richard Simpson*, Rob Gibson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bashir Ahmad*, Brian Adam*, Bill Wilson*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, Robin Harper*, Margaret Smith*, Mike Pringle*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-2350 Medical Aid to Palestine (lodged on 28 July 2008) Gil Paterson*, Dave Thompson*, Ian McKee*, John Park*, Nigel Don*, Christina McKelvie*, Jamie Hepburn*, Mike Rumbles*
S3M-2350Medical Aid to Palestine (lodged on 28 July 2008) Christopher Harvie*, Jeremy Purvis*
S3M-2350 Medical Aid to Palestine (lodged on 28 July 2008) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-2350 Medical Aid to Palestine (lodged on 28 July 2008) Keith Brown*
S3M-2350 Medical Aid to Palestine (lodged on 28 July 2008) Pauline McNeill*
